item.title: About me
item.description: I am a Computer scientist from Innsbruck, Austria. After completing a BSc. in Physics at the University of Innsbruck, I enrolled for the Master’s program of Computer Science. Here my focus has been on information security, cryptography and machine learning. My tools of choice include C, Python and Bash. Currently I am working on my master thesis on generating adverarial images for neural networks in the frequency domain.
